name: No Escape (itch) (RedSponge)
description:
"Welcome Test Subject #5555515 to Experiment #112435782: No Escape"

Try to escape a room, in a twisted and weird experiment, and find out whether or not even when one goes to the extremes.. can they really escape?

No Escape is a puzzle game that was made in a week for the August 2019 LibGDX Jam :)

Source Code: https://github.com/RedSponge/OneRoom
